item.title: New Containers: RustDesk and Ungoogled Chromium
item.description: We have released two new desktop application containers for: RustDesk RustDesk is a full-featured open source remote control alternative for self-hosting and security with minimal configuration. Ungoogled Chromium Ungoogled Chromium is Google Chromium, sans dependency on Google web services.
item.content:
We have released two new desktop application containers for: RustDesk

RustDesk is a full-featured open source remote control alternative for self-hosting and security with minimal configuration.

Ungoogled Chromium

Ungoogled Chromium is Google Chromium, sans dependency on Google web services.
